markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=1466)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Scrying" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=141" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 320 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Barbatos](/Deities.aspx?ID=395), [Followers of Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=322), [Kaldemash](/Deities.aspx?ID=349), [Norns](/Deities.aspx?ID=628), [Ravithra](/Deities.aspx?ID=620), [Shadow Cabinet](/Deities.aspx?ID=372)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You create an [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) floating eye at a location within range (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect). The eye can't move, but you can see in all directions from that point as if using your normal visual senses.
name: Clairvoyance

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Scrying" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=141" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 320 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Barbatos](/Deities.aspx?ID=395), [Followers of Fate](/Deities.aspx?ID=322), [Kaldemash](/Deities.aspx?ID=349), [Norns](/Deities.aspx?ID=628), [Ravithra](/Deities.aspx?ID=620), [Shadow Cabinet](/Deities.aspx?ID=372)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
See through an invisible magical sensor.
</summary>
summary: See through an invisible magical sensor.
summary_markdown: See through an invisible magical sensor.
text: Clairvoyance Source Player Core pg. 320 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Barbatos, Followers of Fate, Kaldemash, Norns, Ravithra, Shadow Cabinet Cast 1 minute Range 500 feet Duration 10 minutes --- You create an invisible floating eye at a location within range (even if it's outside your line of sight or line of effect). The eye can't move, but you can see in all directions from that point as if using your normal visual senses.
